two.description: We're a small team that is working since several months on a minigame, arcade, faction and citybuild server for the minecraft community.

header.headline: About us
header.caption: Minora is a very versatile server. Here you see the main features our team values.

speed.content: Our system is based a 100% on high-end servers, due to us placing great emphasis on quality rather than quantity. We select our servers very carefully. At the moment our servers are hosted by OVH and Hetzner.

support.content: We offer support at almost any time. If you need help, just tell us. We want you to be a 100% happy with our server.

design.content: Details are very important to us. Excellent maps, the chat layout, this site - the team puts a lot of work and patience in good programming, good maps and good design.

environment.content: We attach great importance to power saving servers, and have developed an automatic system which automatically puts servers into standby mode if they are not used. We also program very resource-friendly.

international.content: We try to make the server accessible for every person on the Internet. Our entire Websystem is internationalized. The Minecraft system will follow in the future.

cloudsystem.content: The entire Minecraft server system is based on an automatically scaling cloud system which exactly provides the games which are needed at the moment. The first real, dynamic scaling cloud system. A Spigot Server can provide an instance of a game or a lobby in under 450 milliseconds!

statistics.content: Our programmers have developed an excellent statistics system which is very powerful and detailed, but yet very efficient and resource-saving.

bugsystem.content: We have developed an error-detection system which automatically accesses the game database containing the log of the game in which the person was at the time he reported a bug. If there are errors in the log, a report will be sent & we will fix it.

funding.content: 'Greedy' servers have always annoyed us - and now we want to make it better. The question is: How do you finance a server without being exactly the same? It turns out that that is not possible without donations, and we even depend on them. Due to this we introduced a premium system which provides no unfair advantages over other players.

header.headline: The Team
header.caption: A server is only as strong as the team behind it. Meet our team to find out why we are so passionate about what we do.

lenovouser.name: lenovouser | Silas
lenovouser.description: My name is Silas, and I was born in Baden-Württemberg, Germany. I have lived in Portugal for 3 years, and 2 years in the US. I am very interested in design.

housejumper.name: housejumper | Bjarne
housejumper.description: I am Bjarne and 15 years old. For quite some time I have been intensely in touch with Minecraft servers and Bukkit⁄Spigot plugins. Currently I am learning HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.

advertisement.content:
Pets! Premium server access! Much more!
Support __minora.bold__ and get extra features as reward!

kevkosxd.content: I like the __minora.bold__ server a lot. It has many game modes such as SkyBlock or BloodBath. If you want to build something, you can start directly at the CityBuild world. The __minora.bold__  team is very friendly and will help with any problem.
kevkosxd.name: kevkosxD

anauj.content: I was sure that I would stay here when I visited __minora.bold__ the first time. The team was very nice to me from the start on. I like the concept and I recommend the server to anyone.
anauj.name: Anauj
